nodes.text: Cronese harpices were a model of large warship used by the empire of the Tionese despot Xim. Named for the Kingdom of Cron, the starships were believed to be cruiser-class by Ximologist historians thousands of years after the reign of Xim.
Cronese harpice were first mentioned in The Essential Guide to Warfare, a reference book released in 2012 and written by Jason Fry.
